entity.name: Fears of a global coronavirus pandemic as cases of reported infections surge
entity.description: A rapid surge of new coronavirus cases outside of China, including in Iran, South Korea and Italy, has prompted concerns among infectious disease experts and scientists that the contagion could transform into a global pandemic. The virus had spread to at least 28 countries with more than 76,000 confirmed cases worldwide.

text: @SenSchumer Trump’s cut to the CDC do not bode well in the face of a possible pandemic of the Coronavirus. The elderly, children and those persons with comprised respiratory issues are at great risk. Trump has no plan to deal with this foreboding disaster.
